articles.title: Teenager shot and killed in Dorchester
articles.description: A teenage boy was shot and killed on Ellington Street in Dorchester Wednesday night. WBZ-TV's Juli McDonald reports.

articles.title: Robert Crimo III indicted on 117 counts in deadly Highland Park parade shooting, prosecutors say
articles.description: Robert Crimo III is charged with 21 counts of first-degree murder - three counts for each of the victims killed -- as well as additional counts for each victim who was struck by a bullet, bullet fragment or shrapnel, officials said.
articles.content:
CHICAGO (WLS) -- The man accused in the July 4 Highland Park parade shooting has been indicted by a grand jury on 117 counts, the Lake County (IL) State's Attorney's Office announced Wednesday.
